entries.title: Watch: New ad to push SCHMOVID boosters features Martha Stewart... and a giant samurai sword?
entries.description:
Pfizer is bringing out the big guns in its push for the new Omicron booster shot: Martha Stewart.

That's right, the Food Network darling and ex-convict is now using her fame for the public, er, health. Or something like that.

In the ad, Martha says, "You know that unwelcome guest everyone wishes would just leave already? That's COVID-19. That's why I got the new updated booster, designed to protect against recent Omicron variants." Oh, and she also happens to be sharpening a giant Samurai sword. It's unclear why she is doing this or how it relates to COVID-19. She then proceeds to violently slice the top off of a pineapple, before revealing a band-aid on her arm with the slogan, "got booster?"

\u201cPfizer Releases New Thriller Themed Omicron Booster Spot feat. Martha Stewart Sharpening a Sword \ud83d\ude33\n\n\u201cYou know that unwelcome guest that everyone wishes would just leave already?\u201d\u201d
— Chief Nerd (@Chief Nerd) 1675174565

Fierce Pharma describes the ad as ""Kill Bill" meets "Top Chef" and says Martha is "both charming and vaguely menacing throughout." Not sure "charming" is the correct adjective here. And I still don't understand what a sword has to do with Covid. Is she going to threaten me with it? Will she break in in the middle of the night and kill my anti-vax Uncle Bill? The uncertainty is killing me.

At least this isn't as bad as that time Martha decided to show off the Nativity set she made at "Camp Cupcake," the prison she spent five months at for insider trading. She even showed off her inmate number on the bottom of one of the pieces.

@marthastewart

You’ll never guess where I made this nativity scene…😇Get ready for a storytime #HolidayCountdown #LearnOnTikTok #TikTokPartner




And it's definitely not as bad as when she posted a thirst trap in just an apron. I just found out about this today so now I'm subjecting you to it as well. You're welcome.


See on Instagram

She's also 82 years old, and looks pretty good for her age. So maybe jail-time, thirst traps, and booster shots are the key to staying young. Maybe.

Editor’s Note

entries.title: Google engineer on three-month 'mental health' leave flabbergasted that she got laid off and is whining to the press
entries.description:
The Google layoffs saga continues. We already covered the chick who vlogged her day at Google's adult daycare just before they showed her the door. Today, we've found another Google refugee. This one was laid off while on a three-month mental health break.

\u201cGoogle engineer who was laid off while on mental health leave says she 'silently mourned' after receiving her severance email at 2 a.m. https://t.co/hXJK0ZWji7\u201d
— Insider Tech (@Insider Tech) 1675168700

Yes, you read that correctly. The free food and art displays of Google HQ became too much for her, and as a result, she had to take off a quarter of the year. As a general rule, if you can take three months off from your job with little to no impact on your company, you probably aren't an essential worker. Just a wild guess.

Twenty-nine-year-old Ali Neal told Business Insider she checked her email at 2 AM and saw the notice of unemployment from Google. She immediately called a friend to tell them about her layoff, which she saw as a "personal attack." She then drank whiskey and "silently mourned" her layoff until the morning.

She was quickly removed from her work laptop, emails, and corporate documents. Google won't even let her come to the office to drop off her laptop and other devices. They told her to meet with security somewhere near the office or ship them in a box.

Neal described the layoffs as "Un-Googley," explaining that she had thought of the company as a "safe and stable environment" where the risk of layoffs was low. She also claimed to have "bled for Google" and met and exceeded performance expectations. She also assumed she would be safe from any layoffs due to the fact she was already on leave.

Which makes perfect sense. When a company is faced with mandatory layoffs, they would never choose an employee who has been on leave for several months and whose absence has gone largely unnoticed with little-to-no impact on day-to-day operations. Not in a million years.

entries.title: Only in Chicago: Thief steals over $1M worth of chicken wings from a low-income school district
entries.description:
Not even cafeteria chicken wings are safe from crime in Chicago. Sixty-six-year-old Vera Liddell, the director of food services for Harvey School District 151, has been charged with a massive embezzlement scheme after she allegedly stole over $1.5M worth of taxpayer-funded school meals and over 11,000 cases of chicken wings. She's currently being held at Cook County jail on $150,000 bond.

\u201cVera Liddell allegedly stole $1.5M in chicken wings from Illinois schools https://t.co/EQ4P6I2NXU\u201d
— New York Post (@New York Post) 1675216865

What's even more impressive than the sheer quantity of chicken wings stolen is the short timeframe in which Liddell was able to steal and consume such a vast quantity of chicken wings. Her poultry poaching ramped up during the Covid pandemic when students were no longer attending school in person, but lunches were packaged for families to pick up. The fraud allegedly only lasted 19 months, from July 2020 to February 2022.

The fowl felon was found out after a routine mid-year audit in January 2022 showed the food district exceeded its budget by a whopping $300k, even though it was only halfway through the year. Seems like Vera got a little too cocky in her aptitude for chicken stealing.

At one point, Vera reportedly placed the order for more than 11,000 cases of chicken wings and picked them up in a district cargo van. The order was billed to the school district. Employees of the food supplier, Gordon Food Services, said they knew the chicken thief “due to the massive amount of chicken wings she would purchase."

It is not known what happened to the extreme quantity of chicken wings after Vera hauled them home. Prosecutors noted, “the food was never brought to the school or provided to the students” and that chicken wings are not ordinarily served to students, since they have bones.

The sad part of this story is Harvey School District comprises about 1,600 students, and over 80 percent qualify as low-income. But on the bright side, I bet Vera threw one hell of a Super Bowl party.

Editor’s Note

entries.title: Watch: Half-naked dude leaps on register and pours milk on himself because that's what happens at Walmart these days
entries.description:
Here's my brilliant idea. A Waffle House/Walmart combo. It could be a Waffle House in a Walmart. A Walmart in a Waffle House. They can be adjoining buildings in the same strip mall. There are engineers and architects better at working out the schematics. My only request is that all security guards come with equipment with a smartphone so we get that sweet, sweet content.

Today, the content takes the form of a half-naked dude pouring milk over himself.

pic.twitter.com/Bz9jux4Vju
— Clown World ™ 🤡 (@ClownWorld_) February 1, 2023

I'm willing to chalk up my man here to NOT have a psychotic episode. We've seen plenty of those take part at the checkout, and those are different. We're going to file Mr. Milk under the classic "guys being dudes." He could have lost a bet. He could be pledging a fraternity. That's a fraternity and not a FRAT. Because you would never call your mother a "moth" or your country a...

Or, he and his boys could have just been bored. And when bored guys are being dudes, we do things for no other reason than sh*ts and giggles. On this day, this meant stripping down to your drawers, pouring milk on yourself, and screaming jibberish.

Mr. Milk, we salute you.

Editor’s Note

entries.title: LOL: Coach impersonates 13-year-old basketball player, absolutely WRECKS all the high school competition
entries.description:
Here I was thinking all we had to worry about in female sports was beautiful and brave transgender people dominating the field. Which is their right, of course. Who needs women's sports when you can have inclusivity?

Now, it seems we may also have to worry about adults pretending to be children. At least in Virginia, where a 22-year-old assistant coach impersonated a player. For a junior varsity basketball game. Priorities.

Arlisha Boykins the assistant JV coach for Portsmouth Public Schools, donned the #1 jersey for Churchland High School and played under the name of a 13-year-old player who was out of town at a club basketball tournament. It's unclear if #1 was the number of the 13-year-old, or if Boykins chose it to further establish her superiority over the gangly preteens she dunked on.

The game took place on January 21st game in Suffolk, Virginia. Boykins and the head coach of the Varsity team have both since been fired since the head coach was “encouraging the behavior” during the game.

The players of both teams have decided to opt out of the remaining games this season, due to the embarrassment of having a coach fill in for a 13-year-old. The father of the 13-year-old in question stated, "Coaches always preach to the kids about integrity and those types of things, so I was just shocked." The family also said their daughter is no longer interested in attending Churchland High School next year and they're still waiting on an apology for the whole debacle.

You can see some of Boykins' game highlights in the video below. She had some stellar block shots and rebound shots.

\u201cSomething you don't see every day. An assistant coach on a JV girls basketball team impersonated a 13-year-old player on the team in a game. The coach is no longer an employee of the Portsmouth School District. \n\n@WAVY_News \n\nMore information:\u201d
— Craig Loper II (@Craig Loper II) 1675122038

Twitter has for some reason labeled the video "sensitive content," which could mean "trans-ageism" is the next social justice issue. If this coach identifies as a 13-year-old, then it is her right to absolutely destroy children in a junior varsity game of basketball. Inclusivity, folks.

Editor’s Note

entries.title: Watch: Melinda Gates sheds major doubt on Bill Gates's claim he 'just had dinner' with Jeffrey Epstein
entries.description:
During an interview the other day, Bill Gates awkwardly deflected away from probing questions about his relationship with Jeffrey Epstein. His stellar defense was "I just had dinner with him." Because "just having dinner" with a serial pedophile is perfectly fine. Just imagine if it had been brunch.

Host Sarah Ferguson brought up Bill Gates' ex-wife Melinda twice in the conversation, mentioning how Gates' meetings with Epstein went against Melinda's wishes, and asking if Melinda was warning him about possible sexual exploitation. Gates of course denied the latter since they just ate dinner together and nothing more.

However, a clip of Melinda Gates resurfaced today and shed doubt on Gates' claims. Appearing on CBS, Melinda said she met Epstein “exactly one time because I wanted to see who this man was. I regretted it from the second I stepped in the door." She said Epstein was "abhorrent" and explained, "He was evil personified. I had nightmares about it afterward. So my heart breaks for these young women.”

She also acknowledged Bill's relationship with Epstein was a factor in their divorce, and she had made it very clear she was not happy with his decision to continue meeting with Epstein: "As I said, it's not one thing, it was many things [that led to the divorce], but I did not like that he'd meetings with Jeffrey Epstein, no [...] I made that clear to him."

As the reporting continued to probe, Melinda stated, "any of the questions remaining about what Bill's relationship there was - those are for Bill to answer. But I made it very clear how I felt about him."

\u201c\u201cBill had a friendship with Jeffrey Epstein\u2026he had meetings\u2026I met him\u2026he was abhorrent\u2026evil personified\u2026I had nightmares about it\u2026he was awful\u2026\u201d -Melinda Gates\n\nWhy did Bill Gates state he only had ONE dinner with Epstein\u2026when his x-wife admits there were many?\u201d
— Liz Churchill (@Liz Churchill) 1675227693

I don't know about you, but to me, this sounds like there were more than a few dinners with Jeffrey Epstein, and dinner may not have been the only thing they did together. All I'm saying is, I wouldn't be surprised if Melinda soon went "missing" from the public eye...

entries.title: Woke sports journalismer freaks out Jordan Peterson is allowed to play an arena where they also play hockey
entries.description:
A friend in the business opined recently how upcoming sports journalismers are more concerned with woke activism and only have a marginal interest in sports. These journalismers then go out and prove my friend right over and over and over again. You would think hockey was safe, but that's no longer the case. Now "sports" journalismers are crying when someone they don't like, Jordan Peterson, is allowed to have a show in the same venue where they also play hockey games.

Meet Ian Kennedy. There are only two words here you need to know:

Kennedy is freaking out because Jordan Peterson has a show at the Canadian Tire Centre. Why? Because that is the same place where the Ottawa Senators play hockey. Or, it's not Kennedy freaking out about it. As it says in the title of his content, "experts say." He is only reporting what the "experts" say.

Peterson’s appearance at an arena not only housing an NHL franchise, but operated by a group with representation at the NHL’s board of governors table, has raised concerns among those working to build diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) in hockey.

It hasn't raised concerns. Kennedy just wants those Jordan Peterson clicks. Plus whining about one guy not wanting to wear a specific hockey jersey is so last week. Woke twats have hated Jordan Peterson ever since his controversial opinion that while he is happy to call you whatever you want to be called, it is wrong for government to compel speech.

The author summarizes all the usual Peterson complaints they claim are some version of -phobic, none of which have anything to do with hockey. Then comes the "expert" who "says." Surprise! It's a professor who has the same political opinion as the journalismer.

If NHL teams are truly committed to sustainable diversity, equity and inclusion work, it seems to me that to give a platform to someone with such polarizing views of human rights and responsibilities as Jordan Peterson could be understood by many marginalized hockey fans as being in direct opposition to those DEI goals.

The goal here is to get the Ottawa Senators, if not the National Hockey League itself, to be forced into denouncing Peterson. Then, if all goes to plan, the venue with cancel Peterson's show. Whether or not the Senators win their next few games or not? Meh.

entries.title: Bill Maher's new liberal media peers are lashing out at him being allowed a show on CNN
entries.description:
Hearing rumors that CNN wanted to hire a comedian to liven up the ratings was the funniest CNN thing we've heard since Brian Stelter said he likes girls. Then Bill Maher was given a show on CNN, and it stopped being funny.

Honestly? In Maher's defense, it's a pretty sweet hustle. After his show Real Time, he records an "overtime" show for YouTube. CNN is going to take it and air it on their failing news-content network. Maher does no extra work but gets an extra bag of money. Sweet deal.

The rub is that while Maher is reliably liberal, he's not leftist. Maher has an occasional opinion that goes against accepted leftist thought. And since those occasional anti-leftist thoughts may now be on cable news, hardo leftists are freaking out. Like former MSNBC host Cenk Uygur, who got fired over a decade ago and still can't deal. Please note that while Cenk has a blue checkmark, it's a legacy verified account and Cenk may or may not be notable.

Bill Maher is actually perfect for CNN to be honest. False equivalencies, propping up right-wing culture war talking points, fighting for the status quo and that smug face. Tapper might get jealous because he might be outsmugged.
— Cenk Uygur (@cenkuygur) January 30, 2023

Mehdi Hasan, an MSNBC douche who still has a job there, also has sand in his vagina over Maher getting the CNN gig.

Hmm. Bill Maher is obsessed with this idea that 'cancel culture is out of control.' Yet Maher himself just got a new CNN gig, despite saying outrageous things about Muslims, Arabs, and trans people; making crass jokes about Asians; & using the N-word on TV.

Cancel culture? Ok.
— Mehdi Hasan (@mehdirhasan) January 30, 2023

And Keith Olbermann just hopes someone pays attention to him.

So Bill Maher's leftovers will run on @cnn Friday night. As a veteran guest on that show - not that this is going to top the CNN 92k demo rating average - what about the profanity? pic.twitter.com/P4vDIWVVdt
— Keith Olbermann (@KeithOlbermann) January 30, 2023

How long Bill Maher lasts on CNN, or if he even makes it to February 3rd, is anyone's guess. CNN is so desperate for ratings, the network will no doubt try to keep Maher on the air for the Neislen rating version of outrage clicks. But at the end of the day, Bill Maher still has an occasional opinion that is contrary to the far left and they won't let that be allowed on network TV for long.

Editor’s Note

entries.title: Watch: Canadian politician demands his country denounce Tucker Carlson for making a joke about Canada
entries.description:
We joke about Canada, but it still has its charm. If not for Canada we wouldn't have the Kids in the Hall, Bret "the Hitman" Hart, and Nickleback. But it's ruled by a communist dictator. A man some call the literal Son of Castro: Justin "I Feel Pretty" Trudeau. If there was ever a country to be liberated by the full might of America's armed forces, it would be a country that is already America Jr. That's why patriot Tucker Carlson called for Canada to be liberated from that walking pile of soy and hair goop.

Except, not really. Tucker was at best making a sarcastic point. But that didn't stop a Canadian MP from demanding his colleagues denounce Carlson!

First, the clip from Fox News that has MP Maple McPoutine (I don't care what his name is) angrier than that time Shawn Michaels stuck the Canadian flag up his nose.

I really hope Tucker was not serious about 'liberating' Canada...😳 pic.twitter.com/PEis6VHKn1
— Vera Van Horne (@VeraVanHorne) January 29, 2023

SPOILER: Carlson was not being serious. He was making a sarcastic point about how much money we're sending to Ukraine. Obviously, Canada doesn't want to be liberated from I.F.P. Trudeau. They keep reelecting him because for Canadians are sadomasochists for tyranny. If we're going to liberate anyone for that reason, we should liberate New York and California.

Yet MP Maple McPoutine had virtue to signal. As you listen to his schpeel, ask yourself did he write it himself? Or did he ask ChatGPT to craft him a tweet about Tucker Carlson?

The NDP didn't like Tucker Carlson's sarcastic joke about "liberating Canada" from Justin Trudeau.

MP Matthew Green tries passing a motion to condemn Carlson, only for it to fail. pic.twitter.com/6cFdGZbTqE
— Rebel News (@RebelNewsOnline) January 31, 2023

Lol. He failed too.

There will be no liberation of Canada. Though should President DeSantis decide on Inauguration Day that US Armed Forces had five minutes to kill and sent them to conquer The North once and for all, I can't be the only one who wants to see Jordan Peterson installed as the new Prime Minister.
